definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system

sentences.english: The May Fourth Movement against imperialism and feudalism broke out in Beijing in1919.
sentences.chinese: 反帝反封建的五四運動於一九一九年在北京爆發。

sentences.english: China's anti-imperialist and anti-feudal revolution went through innumerable cruel defeats.
sentences.chinese: 中國反帝反封建革命經歷過無數次悲慘的失敗。

sentences.english: The May 4th Movement was an anti-imperialist as well as an anti-feudal movement.
sentences.chinese: 反帝反封建的五四運動於一九一九年在北京爆發。

sentences.english: Their struggle against imperialism is developing vigorously.
sentences.chinese: 他們的反帝鬥爭正在蓬勃開展。

sentences.english: We should unite and form a league against imperialism.
sentences.chinese: 我們要團結起來組成一個反帝同盟。

sentences.english: This multiparty democracy will be anti-imperialist and anti-feudal.
sentences.chinese: 這個多黨民主將是反帝反封建的。

sentences.english: This refers to the anti-imperialist patriotic movement on May 30, 1925.
sentences.chinese: 指一九二五年五月三十日爆發的反帝愛國運動。

definition: anti-imperialist movement of 30th May 1925, involving general strike esp. in Shanghai, Guangzhou, Hong Kong etc
May Fourth Movement/Chinese national renewal movement that started with 4th May 1919 protest against the Treaty of Versailles
democratic revolution/bourgeois revolution (in Marx-Leninist theory, a prelude to the proletarian revolution)
to save from extinction/to save the nation
the Save the Nation Anti-Japanese Protest Movement stemming from the Manchurian railway incident of 18th July 1931 九一八事變|九一八事变
pinyin: Kang4 Ri4 Jiu4 wang2 Yun4 dong4

definition: abbr. for 五卅運動|五卅运动[wu3 sa4 yun4 dong4], The May Thirtieth Movement (1925)
May Fourth Movement/Chinese national renewal movement that started with 4th May 1919 protest against the Treaty of Versailles
pinyin: wu3 si4 ai4 guo2 yun4 dong4

definition: United Front (either of the two alliances between the Guomindang and the Communist Party, 1923-1927 and 1937-1945)
opposing Yuan Shikai 袁世凱|袁世凯 in War of national protection 1915-1916/same as 反袁鬥爭|反袁斗争
the New Culture Movement (mid-1910s and 1920s), intellectual revolution against Confucianism aiming to introduce Western elements, especially democracy and science
